title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated Parmesan, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka masala spice for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through, set aside.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Add remaining spice and canned tomatoes, simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Wash and dry romaine lettuce thoroughly.
Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place in a large bowl.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss gently to coat.
Top with additional Parmesan and anchovies if desired.
Serve immediately with lemon wedges.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A rich chocolate dessert with a warm, gooey center that flows out when you cut into it.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Melt chocolate and butter together in a double boiler.
In a separate bowl, whisk eggs, egg yolks, and sugar until thick.
Fold melted chocolate into egg mixture.
Gently fold in flour until just combined.
Grease ramekins and divide batter among them.
Bake for 12 minutes until edges are firm but center is soft.
Let cool for 1 minute, then invert onto plates. Dust with powdered sugar.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt, and olive oil.
instructions: Preheat oven to maximum temperature (250°C/480°F or higher).
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired thickness.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a border for the crust.
Arrange mozzarella slices on top of the sauce.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven and top with fresh basil leaves.
Slice and serve immediately.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Crispy or soft tortillas filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with water as per packet instructions.
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, and sour cream.
Serve with salsa on the side.
